New_Haven.The Flats (Woodbridge): The Flats is a neighborhood located in the southeastern end of Woodbridge, Connecticut, in the West River valley Amity area that runs between the hilly western part of town and the rock formation known as West Rock. It also borders the city of New Haven, and specifically the neighborhood of Westville. The valley of Amity is an area located partly in the town of Woodbridge, Connecticut and partly in the city of New Haven.
